projects.title: Online Society management
projects.bodyText:
- Developed a web platform to automate society management tasks and enhance communication.
 - Implemented role-based access control (Admin, Residents, Staff) with Spring Security & JWT authentication.
Integrated Spring Boot + MySQL for efficient backend processing.
 - Built a responsive UI using React.js & Bootstrap for seamless user experience.

projects.title: Cashflow Tracker App
projects.bodyText:
- This is a project cashflow tracker.
 - It trackes your income and expenses.
 - Completely build using MERN stack technology.

projects.title: Personal Portfolio
projects.bodyText:

projects.title: keeper Appliation
projects.bodyText:

projects.title: Blog Appliation
projects.bodyText:
- Created using Node js , express js .
 - User can manage their blog like create , update , post and delete the blog.

projects.title: Gamison
projects.bodyText:
-Players must memorize and repeat an ever-growing sequence of colored lights and sounds.
 -Each level adds one new color to the sequence, testing memory and focus.
